DAILY MARKET REPORT - Monday, April 05, 2021

#GBP trading ⬆️boosted by 🇬🇧 UK faster #vaccination numbers.

#Gold and #crudeoil prices trading unchanged as several markets are still closed due to the #Easter holidays.
